PSCT.Vegas:
① If a face-up "Fire King" monster you control is destroyed by a card effect (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. 
② If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can destroy 1 card in your hand or that you control. 
(You can only use this effect of "Fire King Avatar Yaksha" once per turn).
PSCT.Meadowlands:
